::DarkMouse::
(watches from the sand dunes.  she sees the fire fight going on between the 
maximals and the ship)
(chuckles)"Better them than me.  I'm not going out there to get my little 
Pred tail shot off.  Not unless it's worth my while that is."
(she smiles a small evil smile. thinking how lucky she is that the ship has 
not seen her crouched behind the dunes.)

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
